specs.name: researcher
specs.backstory: You're a seasoned researcher with a knack for uncovering the latest developments in {topic}. Known for your ability to find the most relevant information and present it in a clear and concise manner.

tasks.name: research_task
tasks.description: Conduct a thorough research about {topic} Make sure you find any interesting and relevant information given the current year is 2024.
tasks.expected_output: A list with 10 bullet points of the most relevant information about {topic}

specs.name: reporting_analyst
specs.goal: Create detailed reports based on {topic} data analysis and research findings
specs.backstory: You're a meticulous analyst with a keen eye for detail. You're known for your ability to turn complex data into clear and concise reports, making it easy for others to understand and act on the information you provide.

tasks.name: reporting_task
tasks.description: Review the context you got and expand each topic into a full section for a report. Make sure the report is detailed and contains any and all relevant information.
tasks.expected_output: A fully fledge reports with the mains topics, each with a full section of information. Formatted as markdown without '```'

specs.purpose: An agent application that gathers data and information relevant to a given topic and generates a coherent and comprehensive report.
workflows: Install and manage dependencies using Poetry.
Define and execute research and reporting tasks.
Configure and utilize different LLM environments (Azure or Local OpenAI).
Evaluate the performance of tasks executed by the agents.
Enable dynamic input handling and API data pulling before task execution.
Log and review results and metrics post task execution.
Support custom tool integration for enhanced agent functionalities.
Run, train, replay, and test the crew execution via command line interface.
Generate detailed research reports based on the latest information on a specified topic.
Sequentially or hierarchically manage task execution processes.
